name: whatGame
description: Paint the loading screen with the ooze of 100 dead slimes.

name: backAttack
description: What? Not even backup players are safe from taking damage?!

name: expPipeline
description: Cut down over 1,337 innocent foes, for those sweet battle rewards.

name: unlimitedBladeWorks
description: Collect 150 different items of equipment. You don't even need all of that.

name: upgradeComplete
description: Fully upgrade a weapon - this is the best use of your cash!

name: notPokemon
description: Equip more than 6 summons, but no more than 18, as that would be simply unfair.

name: slaveTrader
description: Enslave a beast, later to be forced into combat against its will.

name: beastTamer
description: Tame a strong monster as you work your way up the food chain.

name: bosssBoss
description: Imprison your boss in a shipping container, for later use.

name: limitsBroken
description: Use a limit break - and if you're reading this in advance - remember to set up a combo first!

name: nuclearHolocaust
description: Destroy the world several times over by trying out every single Limit Break attack.

name: noneAreSafe
description: Capture 50 different foes. No living creature can escape the completionist's snare.

name: noneAreFree
description: Capture 100 different foes. Leave no free animals to graze the fields - all bow before their master.

name: ripInPeace
description: Honour the dead by shuffling away their corpses and bringing in reinforcements.

name: skilledCustomisation
description: Adjust your default abilities to something more unique, and show off the real you.

name: skilledLearner
description: Learn a completely new skill through sheer willpower alone - no practice involved.

name: conductiveStatus
description: Exploit a status effect that increases elemental damage.

name: showMercy
description: Let a surrendered foe go free. Sometimes it feels good to be good.

name: showCruelty
description: Execute a surrendered foe in cold blood. You get EXP either way, so it really is senseless violence.

name: unusualTorture
description: Melt down a captured foe and use it as a crafting material. The foe's consent is not required.

name: roidRage
description: Get a taste of performance-enhancing steroids, like bacon or bread.

name: catPerson
description: Intimidate NoLegs into surrendering, rather than beating him to a pulp.

name: niceGuy
description: Flirt with Natalie to calm her down, avoiding the unsightly beating up of a girl.

name: childMinder
description: Force an exhausted Anna to surrender, rather than having to knock out a child.

name: baitAndSwitch
description: Exploit Lance's weakness to make him surrender, but only during his 3rd and final appearance.

name: helpingHand
description: Complete 10 quests for NPCs, and experience the joy of helping others.

name: publicServant
description: Complete 20 quests for NPCs, hoping they'll ignore all of the damage you've done.

name: questCuck
description: Complete 30 quests for NPCs, as apparently they can't do anything for themselves.

name: xrayGoggles
description: Scan 125 different foes. (Captured foes count as scanned!)

name: likeABird
description: Find 50 secret treasures - keep an eye out for hidden shiny things!

name: eagleEye
description: Find 100 secret treasures - and remember, not all of them shine!

name: treasureHunter
description: Open 200 treasure chests. That's a lot, but also just the beginning.

name: chestGrabber
description: Open 400 treasure chests. You should be in jail by now.

name: professionalBurglar
description: Open 600 treasure chests. Not even the developer knows exactly how many there are.

name: artConnoisseur
description: View a fine piece of framed artwork.

name: damage1
description: Deal over 999 damage with an attack - just smack an enemy hard.

name: damage2
description: Deal over 9,999 damage with an attack - a bit of levelling up should do the trick.

name: damage3
description: Deal over 99,999 damage with an attack - remember to exploit buffs, weaknesses, and statuses!

name: damage4
description: Deal over 999,999 damage with an attack - you'll need to setup a serious combo for this one!

name: damage5
description: Deal over 9,999,999 damage with an attack - this is actually possible at around level 35!

name: over100Percent
description: Buff yourself to the max. Some equips will help out with this... but the foes may beat you to it.

name: secondChance
description: Don't die when you have been killed - the Morale and Auto-Revive statuses can get you out of trouble!

name: unfavourableWeather
description: Sometimes the enemies don't even have to do anything.

name: favourableWeather
description: Watch your enemies be killed by their own environment, or by each other.

name: confusion
description: Get inflicted with the Confused status, and lose control of your own body.

name: fogOfWar
description: Get inflicted with the Shroud status, and succumb to the pain of missing information.

name: berzerkersRage
description: Get inflicted with the Berserk status, and go mad with power.

name: disarmed
description: Get inflicted with the Disable status, and have some of your skills become unusable for a few turns.

name: uncontrollableHunger
description: Get inflicted with the Hungry status, and pig out on whatever you can find.

name: pervert
description: Click on something squishy a few times. There's several ways of getting this one...

name: partySoftly
description: A bunch of poorly drawn cartoon characters get together and smash things.

name: slipNSlide
description: Get familiar with some annoying puzzle mechanics.

name: riverRapids
description: Sail towards unknown lands on a dinky raft that's totally sea-worthy.

name: codeBreaker
description: Discover one of several secret codes.

name: dimDepths
description: The plot thickens as buried secrets are uncovered.

name: secretWorld
description: Use the three Spiritual Stones to open the... Door of Time?

name: wheresSatan
description: Discover the demon hiding in plain sight.

name: bookWorm
description: Read every book in the library - not just for this achievement, but to actually learn!

name: videoGames
description: Talk to every type of games console. They won't talk back.

name: familyRoots
description: Remember what you came from, and keep visiting your family even when you're famous.

name: sometimesInvincible
description: Have fun with the Enchanted and Invisible status effects. They may or may not be useful.

name: secretFarm
description: Help a wizard grow totally legal herbs in a barn.

name: cartographer
description: Fill in the entire world map - which doesn't include secret underground areas.

name: genericHoliday
description: Complete a rare holiday quest. (There's totally no way to cheat the system...)

name: tunnelVision
description: Find all of the treasure chests in the underground labyrinth. (Not counting any rooms!)

name: coolingOff
description: And now, we wait. Quite a while, too.

name: secretSoundboard
description: Find the secret soundboard, just as the name of this achievement suggests.

name: wanderingOut
description: Begin your adventure by wandering away from home and into the jungle.

name: overTheWall
description: Enter the fascists' fortress with a dangerous mission in mind.

name: swamped
description: I have a feeling these woods might actually be haunted.

name: arcticExpedition
description: Unpreparedness won't stop this adventure.

name: alienLandscape
description: Look upon the remains of a devastated landscape.

name: worldSaved
description: Defeat the final boss and finish the main story.

name: popEye
description: Defeat Jotun on Epic difficulty.

name: bashTheFash
description: Defeat Lance and Neon Valkyrie on Epic difficulty.

name: barkAndBite
description: Defeat Laurelin on Epic difficulty.

name: forgottenMyths
description: Defeat Poseidon on Epic difficulty.

name: firewood
description: Defeat Anna and the Mighty Oak on Epic difficulty.

name: goldenGod
description: Defeat Chibi Knight's ultimate form on Epic difficulty.

name: tripleDead
description: Defeat the 3-headed Zombie Hydra on Epic difficulty.

name: ultimateHero
description: Defeat the final boss on Epic difficulty.

name: determination
description: Defeat Snowflake on Epic difficulty.

name: reformat
description: Even if you delete me, I'll be with you forever...

name: doubleTrouble
description: Defeat Sól and Skadi on Epic difficulty.

name: drillBreaker
description: Defeat Neon Valhalla on Epic difficulty.

name: catastrophe
description: Defeat Telperion on Epic difficulty.

name: burningSoul
description: Defeat the 3-headed Blaze Hydra on Epic difficulty.

name: fryyoufools
description: Defeat Vulcan on Epic difficulty.

name: noRespawns
description: Defeat the Crystal Hydra on Epic difficulty.

name: dungeonCrawler
description: Defeat all 5 mega bosses in their optional dungeons, on any difficulty.

name: dustToDust
description: Defeat the hungry golem on Epic difficulty.

name: burnTheWitch
description: Defeat the dark priestess on Epic difficulty.

name: twistedMetal
description: Defeat the killer android on Epic difficulty.

name: demonHunter
description: Defeat the horned demon on Epic difficulty.

name: superSaiyan
description: Defeat the strongest being in the universe on Epic difficulty.

name: endgame
description: Reach wave 30 in the Endless Battle.

name: realDeal
description: Defeat all 5 bosses in the Temple of Trials, on any difficulty.

name: deathbringer
description: Beat the Foe Marathon on Epic difficulty.

name: minibossSlayer
description: Beat the Miniboss Rush on Epic difficulty.

name: megaBossSlayer
description: Beat the Mega Boss Rush on Epic difficulty.

name: bossSlayer
description: Beat the Boss Rush on Epic difficulty.

name: sixthSense
description: Find 200 secret treasures - there's a lot more than that, but let's stay reasonable!

name: criticalCondition
description: Get a triple critical hit, with the power of status effects! (check which ones increase your critical hit chance)

name: gottaCatchEmAll
description: Capture 151 different foes. This game won't actually make you catch all of them, but there was a time when 151 was considered impressive.

name: extremeDifficulty
description: Defeat any boss with all challenge options enabled. Epic difficulty not recommended, but you can try it if you're bored.

name: outOfBounds
description: Find a hidden arcade machine. You're pretty sure it wasn't there before.

name: gameCollector
description: Complete all of the hidden arcade games. This unlocks the boss rush at Matt's house.

name: retroGamer
description: Beat the Arcade Boss Rush at Matt's house on Epic difficulty.

name: historyLessons
description: Beat all simulations on the B2 floor in the Data Bunker, on any difficulty.

name: ebf1
description: Beat both Epic Battle Fantasy 1 simulations on Epic difficulty.

name: ebf2
description: Beat both Epic Battle Fantasy 2 simulations on Epic difficulty.

name: ebf3
description: Beat both Epic Battle Fantasy 3 simulations on Epic difficulty.

name: ebf4
description: Beat both Epic Battle Fantasy 4 simulations on Epic difficulty.

name: epicDuo
description: Beat the 2-Player Boss Rush on Epic difficulty.

name: epicTrio
description: Beat the 3-Player Boss Rush on Epic difficulty.

name: gladiators
description: Complete the Battle Arena with all players on any difficulty.

name: soloSwordsman
description: Complete the Battle Arena with Matt on Epic difficulty.

name: wizardBattle
description: Complete the Battle Arena with Natalie on Epic difficulty.

name: shootingRange
description: Complete the Battle Arena with Lance on Epic difficulty.

name: bowMaster
description: Complete the Battle Arena with Anna on Epic difficulty.

name: catAttack
description: Complete the Battle Arena with NoLegs on Epic difficulty.

name: paperShredder
description: Defeat the Greenwood Library bosses on Epic difficulty.

name: unchartedIslands
description: Sail south of the map, across the Great Sea, to discover exciting new lands!

name: adventureRemix
description: Start a new Custom Game with any settings, and get to Greenwood Village. It's just like the normal game, but fresher!

name: questCompletionist
description: Complete 40 quests for NPCs. You'll need to complete some of the holiday quests too.

name: tradingCards
description: Collect 25 monster cards. Maybe they'll be valuable someday. But maybe not.

name: cardShark
description: Collect all 50 monster cards. Huh? Some of these are just normal animals and household objects...!?

name: epidemic
description: Let everyone on the battlefield become infected with the virus status. Probably not a viable strategy for most fights...

name: bestCustomer
description: Buy everything in the equipment shop. Maybe some new stuff will appear during certain months...?

name: newStrats
description: Win 30 battles with the "More Foe Resistance" and "Less Player Resistance" challenge options enabled.

name: retaliation
description: Win 30 battles with the "Counter-Attacking Foes" challenge option enabled. These foes aren't just going to sit there and take a beating!

name: watchCredits
description: Spend a minute or two watching the credits roll by. A lot of people were involved in the making of this game!
